page.title: 05NASSINGTON SCHOOL.
page.content: Our school has 52 children in it.There are 3 teachers,a secretary and ancillary assistant,a dinner lady and a cleaner.We have a hall which is used for lunch,PE,and special functions. There is a kitchen,a library,and a staffroom.We have 2 gardens and a pond in one.The youngest child in the school is 4 and the oldest is 9.Eleven children come from Woodnewton,5 from Yarwell,33 from Nassington,and one from Apethorpe,Oundle and Wansford.The school is 90 years old although it used to be in another building on Woodnewton Road which is now a private house.We have a pet,a rabbit whose name is Lightning. We have a May-Day and a Christmas play every year.When the children leave they usually go to Kings Cliffe Middle School,Oundle Middle School or a private school.We belong to the Rural Schools Enrichment Project.
